p: As for the ethanol/water ratio, the highest yield of microcapsule was 98.1% under the 1:5 ratio of ethanol to water. There was no statistically significant difference in the microcapsule yields between the solvent ratio of 1:3 and 1:5 ( p < 0.05). Using the optimal reaction conditions, the yield of linalool-chemotype leaf essential oil microencapsulated with Î²-cyclodextrin was 96.5%.
